original: @104a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @104a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: pa da sya aashta ka sto tram /
analyzed: pa da sya aashta ka sto tram /
translated: Padaśyāṣṭaka-stotra

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: tshig brgyad pa'i bstod pa /
analyzed: tshig brgyad pa'i bstod pa /
translated: The Eight-Line Praise

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to youthful Mañjuśrī.

original: zla rgyas zhal 'dra khyu mchog 'dra ba'i spyan //
analyzed: zla rgyas zhal 'dra khyu mchog 'dra ba'i spyan //
translated: With a face like the full moon, eyes like a bull,

original: seng ge'i sgra 'dra glang po'i stobs 'dra zhing //
analyzed: seng ge'i sgra 'dra glang po'i stobs 'dra zhing //
translated: The voice of a lion, the strength of an elephant,

original: ri dbang rgyal brtan rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i thugs //
analyzed: ri dbang rgyal brtan rgya mtsho 'dra ba'i thugs //
translated: A mind as stable as the king of mountains, and as vast as the ocean,

original: lha dbang bla ma'i thugs dbang phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: lha dbang bla ma'i thugs dbang phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage at the feet of the guru, lord of gods.

original: spyan gsum spyan legs pad+ma ltar yangs spyan //
analyzed: spyan gsum spyan legs pad+ma ltar yangs spyan //
translated: With three eyes, beautiful eyes, eyes as wide as lotuses,

original: gnod sbyin klu yi mi 'dras gzigs mdzad cing //
analyzed: gnod sbyin klu yi mi 'dras gzigs mdzad cing //
translated: Gazing with the eyes of yakṣas, nāgas, and humans,

original: thar pa thob mdzad spyan ni dkyus ring ba //
analyzed: thar pa thob mdzad spyan ni dkyus ring ba //
translated: Your eyes are long, bestowing liberation,

original: spyan stong gzigs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: spyan stong gzigs pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to you, thousand-eyed one.

original: lha mchog du ma'i yan lag mchog gis btud //
analyzed: lha mchog du ma'i yan lag mchog gis btud //
translated: Bowing with the supreme limbs of many supreme gods,

original: btso ma'i gser ltar 'bar sku mchod 'os sku //
analyzed: btso ma'i gser ltar 'bar sku mchod 'os sku //
translated: Your body blazes like refined gold, a body worthy of worship,

original: mtshan bzangs mdzes pas rnam par brgyan pa'i sku //
analyzed: mtshan bzangs mdzes pas rnam par brgyan pa'i sku //
translated: Your body adorned with the beauty of excellent marks,

original: bde gshegs de la spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo //🔽blo gros rgyas shing gser ltar dri ma med //
analyzed: bde gshegs de la spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo // blo gros rgyas shing gser ltar dri ma med //
translated: I bow my head to that Sugata.🔽Vast in intellect, stainless like gold,

original: blo gros grags shing mkhas pa'i blo dang ldan //
analyzed: blo gros grags shing mkhas pa'i blo dang ldan //
translated: Renowned in intellect, endowed with the intellect of the wise,

original: sangs rgyas mkha' ltar dri med spyan @104b mnga' ba //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mkha' ltar dri med spyan @104b mnga' ba //
translated: The Buddha, with eyes as stainless as space,

original: dpa' bo mi g-yo blo mnga' de la 'dud //
analyzed: dpa' bo mi g-yo blo mnga' de la 'dud //
translated: I bow to that hero, the immovable one.

original: smra ba'i mchog gyur snyan pa'i don gsung pa //
analyzed: smra ba'i mchog gyur snyan pa'i don gsung pa //
translated: The supreme speaker, speaking with a pleasant meaning,

original: yang dag don gsung 'dul ba'i don gsung zhing //
analyzed: yang dag don gsung 'dul ba'i don gsung zhing //
translated: Speaking the true meaning, speaking the meaning of discipline,

original: smra ba'i dbang phyug rgol bas mi bskyod gsung //
analyzed: smra ba'i dbang phyug rgol bas mi bskyod gsung //
translated: The lord of speech, his voice unshaken by opponents,

original: bden bzhi gsung ba'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bden bzhi gsung ba'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the king who speaks of the four truths.

original: gzhan du mi 'dul 'dul ba'i don du 'dul //
analyzed: gzhan du mi 'dul 'dul ba'i don du 'dul //
translated: Not disciplined by others, disciplined for the sake of discipline,

original: nyon mongs spong sogs rnams par dag pas 'dul //
analyzed: nyon mongs spong sogs rnams par dag pas 'dul //
translated: Disciplined by the complete abandonment of afflictions and so forth,

original: thub pa tshul spyod chen pos legs par mdzad //
analyzed: thub pa tshul spyod chen pos legs par mdzad //
translated: The Sage, well-practiced in the great way of conduct,

original: snyoms shing mdzes pa'i tshems ldan mgon la 'dud //
analyzed: snyoms shing mdzes pa'i tshems ldan mgon la 'dud //
translated: I bow to the protector with even and beautiful teeth.

original: bsod nams dpag med bsags pas sku mdzes la //
analyzed: bsod nams dpag med bsags pas sku mdzes la //
translated: His body beautiful, having accumulated immeasurable merit,

original: 'dom gang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'bar ba'i sku //
analyzed: 'dom gang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'bar ba'i sku //
translated: His body blazing with the aura of light one fathom around,

original: gser sbyangs btso ma lta bur dri med sku //
analyzed: gser sbyangs btso ma lta bur dri med sku //
translated: Your body is stainless, like refined gold.

original: srid las grol sku rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: srid las grol sku rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the Victorious One, whose body is free from existence.

original: 'khor los zhabs gnas mchog gi mtshan ldan zhabs //
analyzed: 'khor los zhabs gnas mchog gi mtshan ldan zhabs //
translated: Your feet rest on a wheel, and your feet bear the supreme marks.

original: lha dbang spyi bos legs pa rab tu btud pa'i zhabs //
analyzed: lha dbang spyi bos legs pa rab tu btud pa'i zhabs //
translated: Your feet are bowed to by the crown of the head of the lord of gods.

original: zhabs sor dra bas legs brgyan mdzes pa'i zhabs//
analyzed: zhabs sor dra bas legs brgyan mdzes pa'i zhabs//
translated: Your feet are adorned with beautiful webs, and your feet are lovely.

original: dpal be'u g-yung drung gis mtshan zhabs la 'dud //
analyzed: dpal be'u g-yung drung gis mtshan zhabs la 'dud //
translated: I bow to the feet marked with a svastika and a śrīvatsa.

original: tshig brgyad pa'i bstod pa dge bsnyen mtha' yas lhas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: tshig brgyad pa'i bstod pa dge bsnyen mtha' yas lhas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The praise in eight verses composed by the lay devotee Anantadeva is complete.
